name: screenbeard
message: Really? a Windows phone? :P Say it isn't so! The new Windows phones look cool, but they won't be out for a while. Personally I'd probably go an Android phone if was going to move away from the iPhone platform (which I'm concidering, but that's another post). The problem with Flash on mobile is how resource intensive it is. You think your battery runs out fast now, wait till you have flash running too!
